works: Architectured new email receiver processing by integrating AWS Simple Email Service, AWS Simple Notification Service and AWS S3 Bucket with the platform which can process 1200+ emails per hour.

Optimized consignment processing by offloading time-consuming tasks like PDF generation, PDF Merging, webhook processing, etc., into background jobs, significantly increasing system performance by 45%.
Integrated modern payment gateway provider into the platform and offloaded the payment verification into background tasks thus reducing the time spent on payment by 30%.
Integrated platform payment features into the invoice app, streamlining payment collection processes.
Integrated email receiver app with AWS and implemented new UIs to manage the processed emails
Implemented and handled 20+ core components/modules which includes but are not restricted to account, app schema, company, payment, pricing plan, jobs, transaction, user, webhook, etc.
Spearheaded and mentored several teams to implement core features like UI drag-and-drop form builder and Machine Learning/Deep Learning capabilities as part of platform module/component.

Handled and improved a lot of apps which are built on top of platform like invoice, expense, doc converter, email receiver etc., with new features thus improving the efficiency of customers ERP processing.
Authored 25+ migration and correction scripts to migrate/correct data on EMR HBase and Solr.
Streamlined and strengthened consignment module to improve the sending/sharing of customer data within the platform(company/group/user), PSB(Peppol) and email.
Enhanced platform functionality by introducing 20+ new SOAP/Rest APIs and 10+ webhooks.
Engineered the order app which automates the process of creating an invoice from an order via UI.
Created Jasper XML report for invoice and order apps which will be used in PDF generation.
Enchanced HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Typescript skills along with Angular framework
Revamped the web platform schema designer with Angular 7 and improved its functionalies accourding to newer needs.
